item.title: 南非央行在发放黄金储备前增加银行配额
item.description: 南非储备银行将增加商业贷款机构可持有并从中赚取利息的超额现金数额，以便向国库支付黄金和外汇应急储备账户的部分盈余利润。【原文：The South African Reserve Bank will increase the amount of excess cash commercial lenders can hold with it and earn interest on, in a move toward paying National Treasury a portion of the surplus profits from the Gold and Foreign Exchange Contingency Reserve Account.】

item.title: 洛杉矶借贷 1.5 亿美元安置数千名无家可归者
item.description: 洛杉矶计划下周发行 1.5 亿美元市政债券，为住房建设筹集资金，以缓解这座美国人口第二大城市日益严重的无家可归者危机。【原文：Los Angeles plans to issue $150 million of municipal debt next week to raise money for housing construction as it moves to ease a mounting homelessness crisis in the second-most populous US city.】

item.title: 法国央行行长敦促不要扩大预算缺口
item.description: 由于投资者对法国大选后的财政前景感到担忧，法国资产遭到抛售，法国央行行长弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔霍（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）再次呼吁避免加深预算赤字。【原文：Bank of France Governor Francois Villeroy de Galhau repeated his call to avoid deepening budget deficits after a sell off of French assets as investors fret over the fiscal outlook for France after snap elections.】

item.title: 墨西哥工业房地产基金竞购战升温
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 和两家寻求收购墨西哥工业地产不动产投资信托基金 TF Administradora Industrial 的竞争对手在墨西哥大选意外结果导致比索下跌后提高了出价。【原文：Blackstone Inc. and two rivals seeking to take over Mexican industrial property real estate investment trust TF Administradora Industrial increased their bids after Mexico’s surprise election results drove down the peso.】

item.title: 嘉吉公司计划在亚特兰大设立办事处，以利用该地区不断增长的技术人才
item.description: 全球最大的农作物贸易商嘉吉公司（Cargill Inc.【原文：Cargill Inc., the world’s biggest crop trader, is opening an office hub in Atlanta, joining a wave of companies seeking to take advantage of the southern city’s growing tech talent.】

item.title: 稳定币发行商 Circle 将员工人数增加 15%以上
item.description: 圈子互联网金融有限公司（Circle Internet Financial Ltd.）今年的员工人数增加了 15%以上，并计划填补类似数量的职位，因为这家第二大稳定币发行商正准备上市。【原文：Circle Internet Financial Ltd. has increased its staff by more than 15% this year and plans to fill a similar number of positions as the issuer of the second-largest stablecoin prepares to go public.】

item.title: 汇丰银行称美国页岩油产量将增长数年才见顶
item.description: 据汇丰控股有限公司称，美国页岩钻探者将在2028年左右停滞之前继续提高石油产量数年，从而使欧佩克+希望美国产量增长更快回落的愿望落空。【原文：US shale drillers will continue to raise oil production for years before the juggernaut stalls around 2028, dashing OPEC+ hopes for a quicker fall-off in American output growth, according to HSBC Holdings Plc.】

item.title: 据称 Vitol 是委内瑞拉所有的 Citgo 母公司的竞标者之一
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，全球最大的独立石油贸易商维多集团（Vitol Group）是竞购炼油商 Citgo Petroleum Corp. 母公司的收购者之一。【原文：Vitol Group, the world’s biggest independent oil trader, is among suitors that submitted bids for the parent company of refiner Citgo Petroleum Corp., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 投资者乐观，南非债券拍卖需求上升
item.description: 在南非各政党同意组成执政联盟并再次选举西里尔-拉马福萨为总统之后，南非每周一次的政府债券销售中投资者的需求上升，表明市场情绪有所改善。【原文：Investor demand at South Africa’s weekly government bond sale rose, signaling improved sentiment after political parties in the country agreed to form a governing alliance and re-elected Cyril Ramaphosa as president.】

item.title: 秘鲁启动债务回购，计划发行索尔计价债券
item.description: 秘鲁推出了一项交换或回购近十种债券的计划，该计划包括重返债务市场出售本币票据。【原文：Peru launched an offer to swap or buy back nearly a dozen bonds as part of a plan that includes returning to debt markets to sell local-currency notes.】

item.title: 据称 EQT 将考虑以 20 亿欧元出售保健消费品公司 Karo
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，EQT AB 正在考虑出售 Karo Healthcare，这笔交易对这家瑞典消费者保健企业的估值可能超过 20 亿欧元（21 亿美元）。【原文：EQT AB is considering a potential sale of Karo Healthcare in a deal that could value the Swedish consumer-health business at more than €2 billion ($2.1 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Vanguard 首次在西班牙招聘员工，力求在西班牙发展壮大
item.description: 全球第二大资产管理公司 Vanguard Group Inc.【原文：Vanguard Group Inc. plans to make its first hire in Spain as the world’s second-biggest asset manager tries to grow in the country.】

item.title: CVC 据称计划于 9 月对价值 80 亿美元的零售商 Zabka 进行 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，CVC Capital Partners Plc 正计划让波兰最大的连锁便利店 Zabka Polska SA 首次公开募股上市，预计其估值将达到 75 亿至 80 亿美元。【原文：CVC Capital Partners Plc is planning to list Zabka Polska SA in an initial public offering expected to value Poland’s biggest convenience store chain at $7.5 billion to $8 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Aquarian 筹资 15 亿美元，以促进信贷和保险业务发展
item.description: Aquarian Holdings 由前古根海姆合伙公司（Guggenheim Partners）高管鲁迪-萨哈伊（Rudy Sahay）于 2017 年发起，从主权财富基金穆巴达拉投资公司（Mubadala Investment Co.【原文：Aquarian Holdings, launched in 2017 by ex-Guggenheim Partners executive Rudy Sahay, raised almost $1.5 billion from sovereign wealth fund Mubadala Investment Co. and other investors.】

item.title: Candriam 首席信息官称法国债券溢价面临危险区风险
item.description: Candriam 公司首席投资官警告说，法国主权债券的风险溢价已接近突破 "危险 "水平，这可能预示着法国将走向金融危机。【原文：The risk premium on French sovereign bonds is near to breaching a “dangerous” level that could signal a path to a financial crisis, warned Candriam’s chief investment officer.】

item.title: 贝尔克在 KKR 帮助下寻求 5 亿美元新融资
item.description: 熟悉情况的人士告诉彭博新闻社，贝尔克公司正在寻求筹集约 5 亿美元的新资金，以帮助对现有债务进行再融资，并充实其现金储备。【原文：Belk Inc. is looking to raise around $500 million in fresh capital to help refinance existing debt and shore up its cash reserves, people familiar with the situation told Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 德国实业家家族在贷款违约后查封了 Signa 公司
item.description: Schoeller 工业家族正在控制一个间接拥有 Signa 旗下几家德国百货商店的单位，希望收回因房地产集团破产而损失的资金。【原文：The Schoeller industrial clan is taking control of a unit that indirectly owns a handful of Signa’s German department stores, looking to recoup money lost in the insolvency of the real estate group.】

item.title: 世界可再生燃料制造商面临废油紧缺问题
item.description: 世界上的可再生燃料生产商即将面临盈利所需的最基本组成部分之一的短缺：充足的废油供应。【原文：The world’s renewable fuelmakers are about to face a crunch in one of the most basic building blocks they need to be profitable: sufficient supply of waste oil.】

item.title: 零日期权蓬勃发展，华尔街面临更严格的保证金规则
item.description: 全球最大的衍生品清算所正在寻求对华尔街公司提出新的保证金要求，因为零日期权的狂热丝毫没有减退的迹象。【原文：The world’s largest derivatives-clearing house is seeking to introduce fresh margin requirements on Wall Street firms as the frenzy in zero-day options shows no sign of letting up.】

item.title: 法国银行作为全球主要贷款人面临引发全球波动的风险
item.description: 法国银行是全球最大的贷款机构之一，由于政局不稳，国家财政受到影响，法国银行面临危机蔓延的风险。【原文：French banks, being among the largest lenders globally, risk contagion as political instability shines a light on the country’s finances.】

item.title: 法国电力以创纪录的德国价格折扣徘徊不前
item.description: 法国的未年电价跌至九个月低点，与德国电价的差距扩大至创纪录水平。【原文：French year-ahead power slumped to a nine-month low, widening the gap with German prices to a record.】

item.title: Imax 拓展中国市场，期待更多好莱坞影片上映
item.description: Imax Corp. 与万达电影控股有限公司（Wanda Film Holding Co.【原文：Imax Corp. signed an agreement with Wanda Film Holding Co. to upgrade and add more screens in China, the company’s second-largest market by sales.】

item.title: 投资者抢购受历史性洪灾影响的巴西银行债券
item.description: 上个月，巴西最大的两家基金管理公司推动了南里奥格兰德州银行（Banco do Estado do Rio Grande do Sul SA）债券的反弹，他们相信该银行能够抵御该国南部历史性洪灾的影响。不过几个月后他们才会知道这个赌注的准确性。【原文：Two of Brazil’s largest money managers fueled the rebound in bonds of Banco do Estado do Rio Grande do Sul SA in the past month, confident it would withstand the impact of historic floods in the south of the country. They won’t know the accuracy of that bet for months though.】

item.title: CVC和ADIA再次出价54亿英镑收购Hargreaves Lansdown
item.description: 一批私募股权买家对 Hargreaves Lansdown Plc 提出了新的收购要约，对该投资平台的估值为 54 亿英镑（69 亿美元）。【原文：A group of private equity buyers have made a fresh bid for Hargreaves Lansdown Plc that values the investment platform at £5.4 billion ($6.9 billion).】

item.title: 零售销售疲软显示消费者脆弱，国债收益率下滑
item.description: 在疲软的美国零售销售数据增强了美联储今年开始降息的预期之后，国债市场反弹。【原文：The Treasury market rallied after weak US retail sales data bolstered expectations for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts beginning this year.】

item.title: 加拿大保持银行资本水平稳定，称家庭债务风险稳定
item.description: 加拿大金融监管机构维持该国最大银行的资本要求不变，这表明官员们相信这些银行的资产负债表足以抵御经济动荡。【原文：Canada’s financial regulator left capital requirements unchanged for the country’s largest banks, signaling that officials believe their balance sheets are strong enough to withstand economic turbulence.】

item.title: 斯道拉公司首席执行官表示将投资 1 亿欧元生产木质电动汽车电池
item.description: 斯道拉恩索公司（Stora Enso Oyj）首席执行官表示，该公司将投资约 1 亿欧元（约合 1.1 亿美元）开展一个开创性项目，在电动汽车电池中使用木材，以替代目前在中国制造的零部件。【原文：Stora Enso Oyj will invest about €100 million ($110 million) in a pioneering project to use wood in electric vehicle batteries and offer an alternative to components currently made in China, according to its chief executive officer】

item.title: 达斯称印度通胀以 "非常 "缓慢的速度放缓
item.description: 印度储备银行行长达斯（Shaktikanta Das）周二表示，印度的通胀率持续低迷，因此印度央行讨论改变货币政策立场的时机尚不成熟。【原文：India’s inflation continues to be sticky, making it premature for the central bank to discuss a change in its monetary policy stance, Reserve Bank Governor Shaktikanta Das said Tuesday.】

item.title: Norinchukin 将出售 630 亿美元主权债券以减少损失
item.description: 据日本农业银行发言人称，Norinchukin 银行计划出售大约 10 万亿日元（630 亿美元）的美国和欧洲主权债券，以避免因错误押注利率而造成损失。【原文：Norinchukin Bank plans to sell roughly 10 trillion yen ($63 billion) in US and European sovereign bonds to stem losses from wrong-way bets on interest rates, according to a spokesperson for the Japanese agriculture bank.】
